channel.title: Education/Courses on Aditya Bhardwaj
channel.description: Recent content in Education/Courses on Aditya Bhardwaj

item.title: Decided on my learning path
item.description: Updated on 20 September It has to be something. It’s been so much time since I picked up a good technical skill or knowledge. I hope this post doesn’t turn into a rant, but I am here to share what I plan to follow. There are so many paths, roadmaps, guides, or websites that one can follow. Classic case of information-overload. Happened to me as well, and me, being anxious and over-thinking, it hits hard.

item.title: Will I finally learn something new
item.description: I also recently applied for a Product Support Intern position in Ericsson recently. It didn’t ask for a lot of technical skills but it surely mentions that a good understanding of Linux, IP, Cloud technologies or Python is an advantage. Of course it is. Keeping up and polishing the basics is the most important aspect of being a developer. The time when I was working in India as a Java developer, my manager often emphasized how crucial it is to be VERY good with the basics of the technology you are working on/with.
